Text: Awesome! This is one of my favorites

FYI...One thing I forgot to mention in the description: Fox aired Season 1 (&2) in a different order than intended, which brought some chronological errors/inconsistencies when viewing.  This torrent numbers the episodes in the correct, intended order for viewing...not in the order they were aired.
Correct sequence?  You are the MAN!!
Is there a widescreen release of these? why is it in 4:3?

I've been pretty active with the torrents for a few years, and I never got an email from Comcast about "Copyright Infringement."

Until this torrent.

At least I got its Share Ratio up to 5.7 before I stopped it.

Best luck,
               -neil-

@Nei1 got the same notice for this torrent and season 2, using peerblock and http://list.iblocklist.com/lists/bluetack/level-1 if anybody knows a better list please post.
